summary: An 'angel-faced' gunfighter is tasked with infiltrating a ranch overrun by Mexican bandits and saving their hostages, including the fiancée of the local sheriff.
cast: Giuliano Gemma|Fernando Sancho|Lorella De Luca|Nieves Navarro|Antonio Casas|José Manuel Martín|Manuel Muñiz|Juan Cazalilla|Pablito Alonso|Nazzareno Zamperla|Francisco Sanz|Jose Halufi|George Martin|Alfonso Alcantara|Francisco Gabarre|Miguel Pedregosa|Carlos Ronda|Duccio Tessari|Juan Torres
keywords: spaghetti western|johnny ringo|u.s. mexico border|italo western|gunfighter
title: Una pistola para Ringo
